sentences.en: Analysts said the deal faced major hurdles in getting official sanction.
sentences.cn: 分析人士说,这桩交易在获得官方批准方面面临重大障碍.

sentences.en: At the federal level, however, it faces higher hurdles.
sentences.cn: 然而在全国水平上, 它面临着更严峻的阻碍.

sentences.en: Davis won the 400 metre hurdles in a new Olympic time of 49.3 sec.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯以49.3秒这一新的奥运会记录在400米跨栏赛跑中夺冠。

sentences.en: Davis won the 400m. hurdles in a new Olympic time of 49.3 sec.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯以49.3秒的成绩刷新奥运会纪录，在400米跨栏赛跑中一举夺冠。

sentences.en: Difficulties, he reassured himself, were only stepping - stones to success, only hurdles to be jumped.
sentences.cn: 眼前的那些矛盾是达到胜利的阶段, 是必不可免的魔障 —— 他这样自己辩解.

sentences.en: However, some experts believe the hurdles to live translation remain high.
sentences.cn: 但是, 一些专家们认为同声翻译的障碍仍然很多.

sentences.en: I came to the hurdles and stood looking over into the hay - field.
sentences.cn: 我走到篱笆那边,站在那里朝着干草场望去.

sentences.en: Many hurdles drive their lead arm forward with a raised elbow.
sentences.cn: 许多跨栏运动员是以提肘的方式来摆动前臂的.

sentences.en: That anything novel ever surmounts these hurdles to evolve is astounding.
sentences.cn: 任何能够跨越种种障碍以求进化的新颖事物都令人惊骇.

sentences.en: The final hurdles have been removed.
sentences.cn: 最后的障碍已被排除了.

sentences.en: There are numerous hurdles on the road to success.
sentences.cn: 在通往成功的路上会有许多障碍.

sentences.en: There are several hurdles to be got over in this project.
sentences.cn: 在这项工程中有一些困难要克服.

sentences.en: There are still plenty of political hurdles to overcome.
sentences.cn: 但还是有大量的政治障碍需要克服.

sentences.en: What hurdles are for Liu Xiang, high jump is for me.
sentences.cn: 刘翔的拿手好戏是跨栏, 而我的拿手好戏是跳高.

sentences.en: Yes, there are very real hurdles to whatever you attempt.
sentences.cn: 是的, 尝试任何事情都会有坎坷.

words.tran_cn: 障碍；跨栏；跨栏跑；障碍赛跑（hurdle的复数）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 障碍竞赛；跳栏赛跑

trans.tran_cn: 障碍（ hurdle的名词复数 ），跳栏，（供人或马跳跃的）栏架，跨栏赛
trans.tran_en: Hurdles is a race in which people have to jump over a number of obstacles that are also called hurdles. You can use hurdles to refer to one or more races.
